content: I think I'm starting to get the hang of it. It makes sense to categorize the skincare set as a want. But what about the designer handbag I bought from Gucci a month ago? Was that a need or a want? I told myself I deserved it after landing the promotion, but looking back, I could've gotten a similar-looking bag from H&M or Zara for under $100. Was that just an excuse to splurge?
